- Voluminous wide sleeves.
- Side slits for added movement.
- Oversized cut.

items.longDescription:
- High-performance windproof down with durable water-repellency.
- *Seamless, with a windproof sheet to keep rain and wind out. *Except at the sides, sleeve undersides, shoulders, and hood.
- Water-repellent finish. *The fabric is coated with a water-repellent agent so the effect lasts longer. The finish is not permanent.
- Warm premium down with a fill power of 750*. *Measured by the IDFB method
- The down pitch width and silhouette have been updated for a casual look.
- Placket front and flap pocket design for a more sophisticated style.
- The fit is adjustable using the adjuster inside the hood.
- Easily dresses up or down.

- *Seamless, with a windproof sheet to keep rain and wind out. *Except at the sides, sleeve undersides, shoulders, and hood.

- Elastic inside the waist creates an elegant silhouette.
- Stand collar keeps cold air out.

- Side slits open up to allow easy movement.

items.longDescription:
The Uniqlo U collection is the realization of a dedicated and skilled team of international designers based at our Paris Research and Development Center led by Artistic Director Christophe Lemaire.

- Casual-looking fabric.
- Lined with square quilted flannel fabric.
- Nylon sleeve lining.
- A modern take on the classic pea coat, in padded fabric.
- The collar can be turned up by fastening the button on the tab.
- With pockets.
